title: zeppelin in spark flavor is broken
body:
<!--
Thanks for reporting a bug ðŸ™Œ â¤ï¸

Before opening a new issue, please make sure that we do not have any duplicates already open. You can ensure this by searching the issue list for this repository. If there is a duplicate, please close your issue and add a comment to the existing issue instead.

Also, be sure to check our documentation first: https://github.com/ml-tooling/ml-workspace
-->

**Describe the bug:**
imported an example zeppelin notebook from stock zeppelin docker image for testing spark 


<!-- Describe your issue, but please be descriptive! Thanks again ðŸ™Œ â¤ï¸ -->
I got this:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Unsupported class file major version 55

<!-- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->

**Steps to reproduce the issue:**

So it seems that some java version mismatch is going on.
